MonsterTrait.Name: Hold Breath
MonsterTrait.Text: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

MonsterTrait.Name: Underwater Camouflage
MonsterTrait.Text: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

MonsterTrait.Name: Water Breathing
MonsterTrait.Text: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

MonsterAction.Name: Tentacles
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus canâ€™t use its tentacles on another target.

MonsterTrait.Name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.
